snippet.title: Your Auburn tailgating guide, plus the best local bars and restaurants
snippet.description:
Your Auburn tailgating guide, plus the best local bars and restaurants by Chris Fuhrmeister on Nov 15 2013, 11:30a
Is Auburn really the Loveliest Village on the Plains? Maybe so. If you're in town for a football weekend, you'll want to visit Quixote's, Byron's and Amsterdam Cafe, among other spots.

snippet.title: The two Rogers
snippet.description:
The two Rogers by Alex Belth on Oct 25 2012, 2:41p
The first time I heard Roger Angell speak was on a movie screen. I was working as an intern on Ken Burns’s Baseball documentary, sitting in a dark sound-mixing studio in the Brill Building in...
